name: Force Command-Desert Eagle
description:
This is an age of chaos. Power is the only currency of the world. Be enslaved, or rise up to rule. Will you find your way to power with your troops and technologies? Develop your base, and teach the invaders a lesson! Train your troops and explore the vast world! Find allies in a legion and bring it to the top! This is our time!

Features:

▪ Best Free-to-play Army SLG Game.
▪ Plenty of troops: Commandoes, Rocket Soldiers, Tanks, and Rocket Launchers.
▪ Carefully designed troop effects, accessories and generals to create a balanced warfare – there is no best troop, only the best player.
▪ Multiple technologies and skills that would help you in different occasions.
▪ Legion awaiting you to join in, defeat opponents and achieve championship.
▪ All kinds of interesting events that allow you to upgrade your Power.
▪ Realistic graphics, fascinating colorization and outstanding sound effects to enjoy.
▪ Specially designed interface for you to operate simpler and easier.

Feel the reality when you see the shells flying above you and hear the sound of rifles, Hurry up collecting resources and developing your base! This is the place worth fighting for! Come and enjoy real life battles in Force Command!

Any questions? Please contact us: E-mail: hi@movga.com
